# giftR

A simple R package to facilitate a fun **White Elephant** gift exchange.

## Installation

``` r

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("carsonslater/giftR")
```

## Example

``` r

library(giftR)

white_elephant(c("Alice", "Bob", "Charlie"))
```

This will open instructions in the RStudio/Positron viewer pane.

Have fun!

# Package index

## All functions

- [`giftR-package`](https://github.com/carsonslater/giftR/reference/giftR.md)
  [`giftR`](https://github.com/carsonslater/giftR/reference/giftR.md) :
  giftR: A White Elephant Gift Exchange Helper
- [`white_elephant()`](https://github.com/carsonslater/giftR/reference/white_elephant.md)
  : White Elephant Gift Exchange Presentation
